title: The Complete Guide to Feeld (2026)
description: Everything you need to master Feeld—from profile creation to first dates. The comprehensive guide for getting the most out of the app.

body.raw:
Feeld is the dating app for the open-minded. But getting the most out of it requires understanding how it works, what makes it unique, and how to present yourself effectively. This is the comprehensive guide to Feeld success.

---

## Part 1: Understanding Feeld

### What Makes Feeld Different

**Unique features:**
- Designed for ENM, kink, and alternative lifestyles
- Couple profiles as standard feature
- Extensive desire labeling
- Privacy features like incognito mode
- LGBTQ+ inclusive design

### Who Uses Feeld

**The user base:**
- ENM/polyamorous individuals
- Couples seeking thirds or other couples
- Kink-curious and experienced
- LGBTQ+ community
- Open-minded explorers
- People seeking alternatives to mainstream apps

### Feeld Culture

**The vibe:**
- Generally more respectful than Tinder
- Expectation of honest communication
- Open about desires
- Less small talk, more real conversation
- Sex-positive but not only about sex

---

## Part 2: Setting Up Your Profile

### Basic Information

**Include:**
- Genuine photos (see photo section)
- Accurate age
- Location (or incognito if private)
- What you're looking for

### Sexuality and Gender

**Feeld offers:**
- Extensive options beyond binary
- Multiple selections possible
- Space for nuance
- Visibility settings

### Desires

**Strategic selection:**
- Choose desires that reflect real interests
- Be specific—it helps matching
- Don't over-select
- Update as you discover new interests

### Relationship Status

**Options include:**
- Single
- Various coupled options
- Can link with partner's profile
- Be accurate about your situation

---

## Part 3: Profile Photos

### What Works

**Effective photos:**
- Clear, recent, and recognizable
- Show your face clearly
- Express personality
- Include full body shot
- Show genuine smile

### What Doesn't Work

**Avoid:**
- Blurry or dark images
- Group photos where you're unclear
- Only filtered/heavily edited
- No face photos
- Misleading photos

### Couple Photo Strategy

**If you're a couple:**
- Include photos of both
- Show you together
- Also individual shots
- Make clear who's who

### Private Photos

**Using the feature:**
- For more explicit or private images
- Grant access selectively
- After establishing rapport
- Respect when access isn't granted

---

## Part 4: Writing Your Bio

### What to Include

**Key elements:**
- What you're looking for
- What you offer
- Personality glimpse
- Conversation starters

### What to Avoid

**Skip:**
- Negativity about past experiences
- Long lists of requirements
- Self-deprecation
- Nothing at all

### Examples of Good Bios

**Try something like:**
- "Exploring ENM with my partner. We date separately and together. Into hiking, film, and long conversations. Looking for genuine connections, not just chemistry."

### Couple Bio Tips

**When writing as two:**
- Make clear who you are
- What you're looking for together
- Both people's personalities
- How you approach dating

---

## Part 5: Navigating the App

### Swiping Strategy

**Approach:**
- Read profiles before swiping
- Don't just look at photos
- Swipe on genuine interest
- Quality over quantity

### Understanding Matches

**When you match:**
- Either can message first
- Message while interest is fresh
- Reference something from profile
- Show genuine engagement

### Using Pings

**The ping feature:**
- Lower pressure than matching
- Shows interest
- Can precede or follow match
- Don't overuse

### Incognito Mode

**Benefits:**
- Control who sees you
- Hide from people you know
- Show profile only to who you've liked
- Privacy at the cost of visibility

---

## Part 6: Messaging Effectively

### First Messages

**Good openers:**
- Reference their profile specifically
- Ask a question they'll want to answer
- Show personality
- Avoid generic greetings

### Building Conversation

**In ongoing chat:**
- Ask and answer questions
- Share about yourself
- Build genuine connection
- Move toward meeting appropriately

### Moving to Meeting

**When to suggest:**
- After rapport is established
- When mutual interest is clear
- Before conversation stalls
- With specific suggestion

### Red Flags in Messages

**Watch for:**
- Immediate explicit content (unless invited)
- Pressure or pushiness
- Disrespecting stated boundaries
- Inconsistency in story

---

## Part 7: First Feeld Dates

### Planning the Date

**Good approaches:**
- Public, neutral location
- Appropriate length (coffee/drinks)
- Easy exit if not clicking
- Safe meeting protocols

### What to Discuss

**Cover:**
- Verify what you're both looking for
- Relationship situations
- What attracted you to each other
- Real getting-to-know-you

### Safety Considerations

**Always:**
- Tell someone where you're going
- Own transportation
- Meet in public first
- Trust your instincts

---

## Part 8: Specific User Types

### For Singles

**Tips:**
- Be clear about your ENM status/interest
- Understand couple dynamics
- Don't try to separate couples
- Know what you're looking for

### For Couples

**Guidance:**
- Both be genuinely interested
- Don't overwhelm singles
- Be clear about what you want
- Value the third person
- Avoid unicorn hunter reputation

### For Poly/ENM

**Best practices:**
- Be upfront about structure
- Explain what you can offer
- Link partner profiles if relevant
- Clear about time/availability

### For Kink-Curious

**Approach:**
- Use desires to signal interests
- Be honest about experience level
- Find patient, experienced partners
- Vet carefully

---

## Part 9: Feeld Majestic (Premium)

### Features Included

**Premium offers:**
- See who liked you
- Unlimited likes
- Advanced filters
- Travel mode
- Additional features

### Is It Worth It?

**Consider:**
- How active is your area?
- Are you getting matches?
- Do you need the extra features?
- Free version is quite usable

### Maximizing Free

**Without paying:**
- Strategic likes
- Good profile optimization
- Patience with matching
- Focus on quality conversations

---

## Part 10: Common Challenges

### Not Getting Matches

**Troubleshoot:**
- Profile photo quality
- Bio content
- Swiping strategy
- Location/timing
- Realistic expectations

### Matches Not Responding

**Consider:**
- Quality of your opener
- Timing of message
- It's normal—don't take personally
- Move on to responsive matches

### Conversations Dying

**Revive or move on:**
- Ask engaging questions
- Suggest meeting
- Know when to let go
- Focus energy on engaged matches

### Ghosting

**Handle by:**
- Expecting some
- Not taking personally
- Not sending angry messages
- Moving forward

---

## Part 11: Feeld Etiquette

### The Unwritten Rules

**Respect:**
- Read profiles before messaging
- Don't pressure after rejection
- Be honest about situation
- Follow through on plans
- Maintain privacy

### For All Users

**Always:**
- Consent in all interactions
- Honesty about circumstances
- Respect for boundaries
- Communication about changes

### Handling Rejection

**Do:**
- Accept gracefully
- Wish them well
- Move on

**Don't:**
- Demand explanations
- Insult them
- Keep messaging
- Take it personally

---

## Part 12: Long-Term Success

### Consistency Over Time

**Sustained results from:**
- Regular but not obsessive use
- Profile updates over time
- Learning from experiences
- Adjusting approach based on results

### Building Connections

**Beyond matching:**
- Quality conversations
- Successful dates
- Genuine connections
- Potentially lasting relationships

### Avoiding Burnout

**Prevent fatigue by:**
- Taking breaks when needed
- Not over-investing in any one match
- Maintaining life outside apps
- Keeping perspective

---

## FAQ

**How is Feeld different from Tinder?**
Designed for ENM/kink/alternative, allows couple profiles, more gender/sexuality options, generally more respectful culture, focuses on open-minded connections.

**Is Feeld only for sex?**
No. While many use it for casual connections, many seek relationships, friendships, or exploration. It's about connection beyond mainstream.

**Can I use Feeld if I'm monogamous?**
Yes, though you may encounter many ENM people. Be clear about what you're seeking.

**Is Feeld safe?**
As safe as any dating app. Use standard precautions: meet publicly first, tell someone where you are, trust your instincts.

---

## Related Guides

- [The Complete Feeld Profile Audit Checklist](/feeld-guide/feeld-profile-audit)
- [30 Feeld Conversation Starters That Actually Work](/feeld-guide/feeld-conversation-starters)
- [Feeld Messaging Etiquette](/feeld-guide/feeld-messaging-etiquette)

---

## Your Feeld Journey

Feeld offers something unique in the dating app world. Used well, it connects you with like-minded people you might never find elsewhere. [Poise](/download) helps you communicate your way to the connections you're seeking.
